programming: a screenshot of an IDE or code editor or terminal
a screenshot of iterm2 with pure black background
video: a screenshot of a video player with playback controls, a progress bar and timestamp, volume and fullscreen icons, on youtube or bilibili
a screenshot of Bilibili (B站) or an online video platform homepage showing many video thumbnails and category tabs
a screenshot of a video player with playback controls, a progress bar, and a visible comments or bullet-screen (danmu) section
a screenshot of an online video platform in a web browser, showing a video thumbnail or player, and containing text elements like 'subscribe', 'comments', 'danmu (bullet screen)'.
a screenshot of a video content page where the main focus is a large player window or video content.
writing: a screenshot of a note-taking app like Obsidian or Notion
search: a screenshot of a web browser showing search results, a technical documentation page or article, or a Wikipedia page
sheet: a screenshot of a spreadsheet or data table with rows and columns
a screenshot of Google Sheets or Microsoft Excel interface
a screenshot of a business chart visualizing data, such as an analytical graph, bar chart, or detailed gantt diagram
a screenshot of a project timeline or task schedule displayed as horizontal bars
a screenshot of a dashboard or report containing data plots and axes
game: a screenshot of a digital game store or library showing game covers, prices, 'Add to Cart' or 'Buy Now' buttons, and user reviews for PC/console games.
a screenshot of a fullscreen game interface showing complex Heads-Up Display (HUD), character stats, or in-game menus
a screenshot of the Steam application interface, NOT in a web browser, but in the desktop client showing the Library or Store.
music: a screenshot of a music player displaying album art, song titles, artist names, or a playlist
a screenshot of a music streaming application like 网易云音乐, Spotify, or Apple Music, with a distinctive dark or colored theme
a screenshot of media playback controls, like play, pause, next/previous track buttons, and a song progress bar, along with album art, artist/song titles, and volume control
chat: a screenshot of a chat application showing a message history with speech bubbles or message boxes
a screenshot of Wechat or Discord application
a screenshot of a vertical list of contacts or conversations on the left side of an application
idle: a screenshot of wallpaper or desktop
a screenshot of wallpaper has app dock in MacOS style
